plot outline: Vidya(sujatha), a writer and her husband Buchi Babu(sarath babu) with their daughter moves next to the house of a retired actress and her teenage daughter baby (saritha). baby is a naughty girl who teases Buchi babu and both the families become good friends. Under certain circumstances Baby loses her mother and vidya decides to adopt her and raise as her own. The story moves around how Buchi babu and baby gets closer to each other and have a kid. What vidya decides for them and her family.
title: Guppedu Manasu
